title: Save the Date Font
content:
Please id the "Save the date" font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415114011im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_fullxfull_4014.484130316_2ps0.jpg)
author: urlingo

comments.content: Doesn’t look like a font to me.
Yeah, unless the font has at least 3 variations of the lower-case E, that's not a font.
